item.title: OpenAI 正在与加州商谈成为营利性公司事宜
item.description: 通过与监管机构进行初步讨论，OpenAI 正在推进其将价值 1,570 亿美元的公司的非营利性结构转变为营利性业务的努力。【原文：OpenAI is advancing in its bid to transform the non-profit structure of the $157 billion company into a for-profit business by having preliminary discussions with regulators.】

item.title: 大选箭在弦上，亚洲股市保持谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 随着美国总统大选和美联储利率决议时间的临近，风险厌恶情绪不断升温，亚洲股市当天涨跌不一。【原文：Asian equities were set for a mixed day amid increasing risk-off sentiment, as the clock ticked down to a tight US presidential election and the Federal Reserve rate decision.】

item.title: 白金级公关软件公司 Cision 成立新法人实体
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，铂金股权公司（Platinum Equity）支持的 Cision Ltd. 向一些贷款机构披露，该公司于 11 月 1 日成立了一家新的控股公司，一些贷款机构认为此举是资产出售或抵押品转让前的第一步。【原文：Platinum Equity-backed Cision Ltd. disclosed to some lenders that it created a new holding company on Nov. 1, a move some lenders are considering as the first step before an asset sale or collateral transfer, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 汽车业低迷影响预测，恩智浦暴跌
item.description: 恩智浦半导体公司（NXP Semiconductors NV）受汽车行业增长放缓的影响，对第四季度的销售和盈利作出了令人失望的预测，在尾盘交易中下跌。【原文：NXP Semiconductors NV fell in late trading after giving a disappointing forecast for fourth-quarter sales and earnings, hurt by a slowdown in the automotive industry.】

item.title: Palantir 公布创纪录利润，称人工智能需求 "坚定不移
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc. 公布的季度收入超过了分析师的预期，并上调了对当期营业收入的预期，理由是美国对其人工智能软件的需求很高。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. reported quarterly revenue that beat analysts’ estimates and raised its forecast for operating income in the current period, citing high demand in the US for its artificial intelligence software.】

item.title: TGI Friday 寻找买家，面临与债券销售相关的障碍
item.description: TGI Friday's Inc.的一位律师周一表示，该公司正在与潜在买家洽谈，并透露，由于失去了用于担保 2017 年出售的 3.75 亿美元债券的资产控制权，该公司的收入受到了 "重大 "打击。【原文：TGI Friday’s Inc. is speaking with potential buyers, a company attorney said Monday, and disclosed it suffered a “significant” revenue hit when it lost control of assets it used to secure $375 million in bonds it sold in 2017.】

item.title: 马斯克削减 2 万亿美元预算会让这些股票大涨
item.description: 还有一天就是美国总统大选了，华尔街的战略家们正在为前总统唐纳德-特朗普或副总统卡马拉-哈里斯获胜所带来的经济影响做准备，从税收、关税到移民。【原文：With the US presidential election a day away, Wall Street strategists are preparing for the economic ramifications of former President Donald Trump or Vice President Kamala Harris winning, from taxes to tariffs to immigration.】

item.title: 渴求核能的人工智能校园需要新策略来快速寻找能源
item.description: 在美国监管机构否决亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）利用宾夕法尼亚州一处核设施的努力后，希望快速为大规模人工智能中心提供电力的科技巨头们将需要新的计划。【原文：Tech giants looking to quickly power massive artificial intelligence centers will need new plans after US regulators quashed Amazon.com Inc.’s effort to tap a Pennsylvania nuclear facility.】

item.title: 新泽西州通勤缓解措施可能取决于美国大选，资金尚无着落
item.description: 在夏季列车故障导致进出纽约的通勤脱轨几个月后，能否获得更多的交通资金来解决这些问题，可能取决于周二的选举。【原文：Months after a summer of train breakdowns derailed commutes in and out of New York, more transit funding to fix the challenges could hinge on Tuesday’s election.】

item.title: 德国萨尔茨吉特钢铁公司称投资者关注收购要约
item.description: 德国钢铁生产商 Salzgitter AG 的一位大股东已通知该公司，计划收购该公司。【原文：A major shareholder of German steel producer Salzgitter AG has notified the company of its plans to pursue a takeover of the company.】

item.title: 死亡人数增加，西班牙国王警告警惕洪水误报
item.description: 西班牙国王费利佩四世警告愤怒的居民注意社交媒体上流传的错误信息和虚假说法，因为最近几天有 200 多人死于洪水。【原文：Spanish King Felipe IV warned angry residents about misinformation and false claims circulating on social media after more than 200 people died in floods in recent days.】

item.title: 加拿大服装零售商 Dynamite 集团为首次公开募股聘请银行家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大女装零售商 Groupe Dynamite Inc.【原文：Groupe Dynamite Inc., a Canadian retailer of women’s clothing, has hired banks for an initial public offering that’s likely to be marketed in the coming weeks, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚交易所上市新西兰债券期货面临重大障碍
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所表示，由于担心流动性有限和缺乏交易透明度，澳大利亚明年重新上市新西兰政府债券期货的计划面临重大挑战。【原文：Australia’s plan to re-list New Zealand government bond futures next year faces major challenges due to concerns about limited liquidity and lack of trading transparency, according to the nation’s securities exchange.】

item.title: 风险投资公司 A16z 为 2026 年中期选举向 Fairshake 认捐 2300 万美元
item.description: 甚至在美国总统大选结果出来之前，Andreessen Horowitz 就已经向政治行动委员会 Fairshake 及其附属机构认捐了超过 2300 万美元，用于在 2026 年中期选举期间支持对加密货币友好的候选人。【原文：Even before the US presidential election results are in, Andreessen Horowitz has pledged more than $23 million to the political action committee Fairshake and its affiliates to support crypto-friendly candidates during the midterm elections in 2026.】

item.title: Uber 建议因油价下跌而削减纽约市司机最低工资
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. ）计划提出削减纽约市司机基本工资率等建议，以降低其最大市场之一的乘车价格。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. plans to propose a cut to New York City drivers’ base pay rate, among other recommendations, as it seeks to lower prices of rides in one of its largest markets.】

item.title: 养老院运营商 PACS 在《兴登堡空头报告》发布后暴跌
item.description: 兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）发布了一份简短报告，称养老院运营商 PACS 集团公司 "系统地欺骗纳税人"，该公司股价周一暴跌 33%。【原文：Shares of nursing home operator PACS Group, Inc. tumbled as much as 33% on Monday after Hindenburg Research released a short report alleging that the company has been — among other things — “systematically scamming taxpayers.”】

item.title: 美国木材业将结束加拿大的主导地位，因为关税已造成影响
item.description: 随着数十年来贸易限制的影响逐渐显现，美国南部有望超越加拿大在北美木材业长期占据的主导地位。【原文：The southern US is poised to surpass Canada’s long-held dominance over the North American lumber industry as decades of trade restrictions take a toll.】

item.title: 英国石油公司投资阿根廷生产绿色航空燃料
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由英国石油巨头英国石油公司（BP Plc）持股一半的泛美能源集团（Pan American Energy Group）正在酝酿一项投资，在其位于布宜诺斯艾利斯郊外的炼油厂生产清洁航空燃料。【原文：The Pan American Energy Group, half-owned by British oil major BP Plc, is mulling an investment to make clean jet fuel at its refinery outside Buenos Aires, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 富兰克林股价因 Wamco 530 亿美元资金外流和 CFTC 调查而下跌
item.description: 富兰克林资源公司股价下跌达 7.7%，原因是有消息称美国商品期货交易委员会（Commodity Futures Trading Commission）正在调查 Western Asset Management Co.【原文：Shares of Franklin Resources Inc. fell as much as 7.7% on news that the Commodity Futures Trading Commission is investigating trades at Western Asset Management Co., and that $18 billion of long-term cash had flowed out of that unit last month.】

item.title: 对特朗普过早宣称 2024 年获胜的担忧与日俱增
item.description: 随着美国朝着另一个旷日持久且可能存在争议的选举结果驶去，一个问题笼罩着华盛顿的办公室、纽约的新闻机构和硅谷的社交网络：如果唐纳德-特朗普再次过早地宣布自己获胜，会发生什么？【原文：With the US barreling toward another protracted and potentially disputed election result, one question hangs over offices across Washington, news organizations in New York, and social networks in Silicon Valley: What happens if Donald Trump again prematurely declares himself the winner?】

item.title: 期待这次大选在社交媒体上的表现与 2020 年有所不同
item.description:
Meta 和 X 表示他们在 2020 年的内容节制方面做得太过分了，这与许多社交媒体操纵专家希望听到的结果恰恰相反。【原文：

Meta and X have indicated they went too far on content moderation in 2020, which is the opposite of what many experts on social media manipulation want to hear. 

】

item.title: 建造无人机与建造房屋
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.description:

item.title: 泰尔在阿尔特曼支持的核能公司所持股份的锁定期即将结束
item.description: 山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）支持的先进核能系统开发商 Oklo 公司自今年早些时候上市以来，其创始人和早期投资者获得了巨额的纸面财富。彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）的风险投资公司也是即将开始套现的投资者之一。【原文：A manic rally for Oklo Inc., a developer of advanced nuclear systems backed by Sam Altman, has delivered a massive paper windfall to its founders and early investors since going public earlier this year. Peter Thiel’s venture capital firm is among those able to start cashing in soon.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉放任玻利瓦尔下滑，赌通胀重燃的风险
item.description: 委内瑞拉政府正在让玻利瓦尔贬值，以平息自 7 月大选以来不断上升的对美元的需求，这有可能引发新一轮通货膨胀。【原文：Venezuela is letting the bolivar depreciate as the government tries to quell demand for US dollars that’s been rising since July’s election, risking sparking a new bout of inflation.】

item.title: 监管机构酝酿调查，对冲基金基础交易面临审查
item.description: 对冲基金对美国国债的押注创下新高，正面临新的审查，因为全球最强大的金融监管机构正考虑深入研究这种赚钱的交易。【原文：Hedge funds’ record bet on US Treasuries is facing fresh scrutiny as the world’s most powerful financial watchdog mulls a deep dive into the money-spinning trade.】

item.title: Meta 向美国国防机构和承包商开放其人工智能模型
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司已批准美国政府机构和国防承包商使用其人工智能模型，这为 Meta 技术在军事和国家安全工作中发挥关键作用打开了大门。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has granted approval for US government agencies and defense contractors to use its AI models, opening the door for Meta’s technology to play a key role in military and national security efforts.】

item.title: 莫迪谴责袭击印度教寺庙和驻加拿大外交官的行为
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）周一谴责了对加拿大一座印度教寺庙的袭击，并将印度领事营地外发生的破坏事件描述为企图恐吓印度外交官的 "令人震惊的 "行为，因为两国关系正在恶化。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday condemned the attack on a Hindu temple in Canada and described the disruptions outside an Indian consular camp an “appalling” attempt to intimidate its diplomats as relation between the two nations ebb.】

item.title: 交易员在美国大选波动前抛售新兴债券 ETF
item.description: 10 月份，投资者从购买新兴市场债券的交易所交易基金中撤资，原因是交易商在周二美国大选前降低了风险。【原文：Investors yanked money from exchange-traded funds that buy emerging-market bonds in October as traders reduced risk ahead of the high-stakes US election on Tuesday, the outcome of which remains a coin toss.】

item.title: Peloton 因美国银行看好盈利前景和新任首席执行官而上涨
item.description: 周一，Peloton Interactive Inc. 获得了罕见的买入评级，美国银行公司将这家健身公司的评级提升了两级，看好其盈利前景和新任首席执行官。【原文：Peloton Interactive Inc. picked up rare buy rating Monday as Bank of America Corp. upgraded the fitness company by two notches, touting its profit outlook and a positive view of its new chief executive.】
